“ The reasons for his [ the applicant 's ] detention are still valid . There is still a fear that he will attempt to influence [ witnesses or co - defendants ] ; in addition there is a likelihood that a severe penalty will be imposed on the [ applicant ] , because he has been charged with an offence for which he may be liable to a statutory maximum sentence of DATE imprisonment . Special reasons to the contrary , as referred to in LAW ORG [ Code of Criminal Procedure ] , have not been found in the case . The possibility of applying another preventive measure could be reconsidered when information from ORG on his [ the applicant 's ] health has been obtained ” .

It stated that according to the information obtained from the Deputy Director of ORG the applicant had been examined by a doctor and would be examined in the near future by a urologist . It further pointed out that the applicant 's health was not an impediment to his continued detention .
CARDINAL . During the court proceedings the authorities extended the applicant 's detention on many occasions .
CARDINAL . The relevant decisions were given on the following dates .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Ząbkowice Śląskie ORG extended the applicant 's detention until DATE . The court gave the following reasons for its decision :
